pepperoni.name: Pepperoni
pepperoni.desc: The classic gourmet pizza that is ideal for any night, complete with mozzarella cheese and pepperoni.

cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.desc: The simplest of pizza made with classic marinara sauce topped with mozzarella cheese.

meat-lovers.name: Meat Lovers
meat-lovers.desc: Meat lover's pizza is the perfect game day pizza, packed with everyone's favorite meat!

supreme.name: Supreme
supreme.desc: Enjoy this freshly prepared pizza for family dinner or a group lunch.

veggie.name: Veggie
veggie.desc: Featuring all the classic vegetable toppings you know and love.

hawaiian.name: Hawaiian
hawaiian.desc: Take a quick trip to paradise, this simple pizza is perfect for any get together.

buffalo-chicken.name: Buffalo Chicken
buffalo-chicken.desc: This classic pizza featuring tasty buffalo sauce and tender chicken is your go-to for any weeknight.
